channel.title: Simple Question - Making Npc's Talk! [Will Rep++!]
channel.description:
Hello everybody,
Well I am having a bit of trouble constructing my server at the moment. I have a simple question, and I hope that somebody can answer.
I am willing to Rep ++ whoever gives me the correct answer.
What I need help with: Well, I'm trying to make my npc talk, I can get it to do that. But when it says one line and the 'Click here to continue', after clicking 'Click here to continue', it says something else.
[Put simple and straight forward] My npc says "Hello!" - Click here to continue I want it so when I click 'click here to continue', it says "Welcome to _______, [playerName]
MY BASE: I am using DEVOLUTION V7
That's all, so remember if you can give me a correct answer, I WILL give you Rep ++.
Thanks in advance. - Jackson!

item.title: Simple Question - Making Npc's Talk! [Will Rep++!]

@Ace1 wrote:

Hm, sorry, didn’t work.

item.title: Simple Question - Making Npc's Talk! [Will Rep++!]
item.dc:creator: @str8golden str8golden
item.description:
@str8golden wrote:

~ first post FTW add my msn tyler_1blood@hotmail.com and ill set ye up ^___^

ok im gonna just put this STR8 in ur face ok? maybe ull understand XD

1st Open NPCHANDLER.java
2md search sumthing like welcome w/e till u find a code similar 2 this

                                                                         if (npcs[i].npcType == 1835) {
					if (misc.random2(20) == 1) {
					npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
					npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
				}	npcs[i].textUpdate = "your text here: compile save.!!!!";
					}

if (npcs[i].npcty[e == your npc id
if (misc.random2)(20) == 1) { dont change
next 2 lines keep the same
update the text update with ur text
compile.save.reset / run server.

rep me if i helped ^________^
add that underthe last found npc

Read full topic

Hello everybody,

Well I am having a bit of trouble constructing my server at the moment. I have a simple question, and I hope that somebody can answer.
